metadata.name: Space Where Space Was 001
metadata.description:
This token (NFT) is a digital receipt for the purchase of the original drawing shown.

Various Inks on Römerturm 250g Drawing Paper
297 x 420 mm
1/1
2023
Artist- Ken Wiatrek
Photograph- Joseph Devitt Tremblay

This token comes with the original drawing, to be claimed by the token holder via Artfora- https://www.artfora.com/collections/space-where-space-was. If you choose not to use Artfora’s service, please contact Ken Wiatrek (@KenconsumerE on Twitter or kenconsumer @gmail.com) to arrange for shipping.
Upon resale on the secondary market, the original drawing shall be shipped to the new owner. The receiver of the work will cover shipping costs.
